candidates.definition: A device with moving mechanical parts that transmits or transforms force and motion to perform work.

positive_examples: The gears in the transmission shifted smoothly as the car accelerated.
She oiled the flywheel to reduce friction in the old printing press.
The rotor spun rapidly inside the generator's housing.
The mechanical joint connecting the two shafts needed replacement.
He adjusted the gearbox settings to increase the machine's torque.
The stator remained stationary while the rotor turned at high speed.
negative_examples: The thermometer measured the patient's temperature accurately.
She plugged the charger into the wall outlet.
The LED display showed the current time and date.
The fiber optic cable transmitted data at high speeds.
He pressed the button to activate the electronic sensor.
The battery provided power to the portable radio.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: ElectronicDevice, Sensor, PowerSupply, OpticalDevice, MeasurementInstrument

candidates.definition: Hardware components and infrastructure systems that enable computational processing and data center operations.

positive_examples: The data center's GPU cluster processes machine learning workloads around the clock.
Our server rack includes high-speed interconnects between the processing units.
The cooling system maintains optimal temperatures for the computational hardware.
Power distribution units supply electricity to all the computing equipment.
Network fabric enables rapid communication between compute nodes.
Monitoring sensors track the performance metrics of our processing infrastructure.
negative_examples: The smartphone's touchscreen display shows the user interface clearly.
Medical imaging equipment captures detailed X-ray scans of patients.
The car's GPS navigation system provides turn-by-turn directions.
Industrial sensors measure temperature and pressure in the manufacturing plant.
The building's security cameras monitor the entrance lobby.
Wireless speakers stream music from the mobile device.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: MedicalDevice, NavigationSystem, AudioEquipment, DisplayTechnology

candidates.definition: Devices designed for entertainment, exercise, or leisure activities that people use for fun or fitness.

positive_examples: She spent an hour on the treadmill at the gym this morning.
The kids are playing video games on their gaming console.
He lifted weights using the barbell in his home gym.
They watched a movie on their smart TV last night.
The exercise bike helped her stay in shape during winter.
The family enjoyed playing music on their stereo system.
negative_examples: The dishwasher finished cleaning all the dinner plates.
She used a hair dryer to style her hair before work.
The mechanic repaired the car engine with specialized tools.
The surgeon used medical equipment during the operation.
He programmed the thermostat to regulate room temperature.
The construction worker operated heavy machinery at the site.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: KitchenAppliance, MedicalDevice, CommunicationDevice, SecurityDevice

candidates.definition: Handheld instruments designed to perform specific tasks or functions

positive_examples: She picked up a pen to sign the contract
The hiker used his compass to find north
He reached for a pencil to sketch the design
The explorer checked her compass before heading into the forest
The writer grabbed a marker to highlight the important passages
They used a compass to navigate through the wilderness
negative_examples: The smartphone displayed the GPS directions
She used her laptop to write the document
The printer produced copies of the report
He checked the weather app on his tablet
The smartwatch showed the navigation route
The electronic display indicated the direction
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Electronics, Machinery, Appliances, Vehicles

candidates.definition: Electrical or mechanical devices designed for specific household tasks, especially cooking and food preparation.

positive_examples: She used the blender to make a smoothie for breakfast.
The slow cooker had been simmering the stew all day.
He plugged in the electric can opener to open the tomatoes.
The bread machine kneaded the dough automatically.
They grilled vegetables on the outdoor barbecue.
The pressure cooker reduced the cooking time significantly.
negative_examples: She used a sharp knife to chop the vegetables.
The wooden spoon stirred the soup gently.
He opened the can with a manual can opener.
The cast iron pan heated evenly on the stove.
She measured flour using metal measuring cups.
The ceramic bowl held the mixed ingredients.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Tool, Instrument, Machine, Equipment

candidates.definition: Mechanical components and systems that enable vehicle operation, movement, and control

positive_examples: The brake pads need to be replaced after 50,000 miles of driving
He pressed the clutch pedal to shift into third gear
The mechanic inspected the axle for signs of wear and damage
The drive belt was squealing and needed immediate replacement
She applied the brakes gradually as she approached the intersection
The ball bearings in the wheel hub were making a grinding noise
negative_examples: The radio in the car wasn't working properly
He adjusted the air conditioning to cool down the cabin
The GPS system provided turn-by-turn directions
She plugged her phone into the car charger
The headlights automatically turned on at dusk
The seat heaters made the drive more comfortable
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: ElectronicDevice, ComputerHardware, HomeAppliance, MedicalDevice, AudioEquipment

candidates.definition: Devices designed to protect people from harm, danger, or security threats

positive_examples: The fire alarm started beeping when smoke filled the kitchen
She grabbed the fire extinguisher to put out the small grease fire
Construction workers set up barricades around the dangerous work zone
The security device on the window prevented unauthorized entry
Emergency safety devices are required in all public buildings
The safety equipment helped prevent injuries during the accident
negative_examples: The ultrasonic sensor detected movement in the room
He used a measuring device to check the temperature
The communication device transmitted the signal clearly
She operated the mechanical device to lift the heavy box
The diagnostic device analyzed the blood sample results
The entertainment device played music throughout the house
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: MeasuringDevice, CommunicationDevice, MechanicalDevice, DiagnosticDevice

candidates.definition: Devices designed for healthcare, diagnosis, treatment, or monitoring of patients and medical conditions.

positive_examples: The nurse inserted the IV needle into the patient's arm.
The pulse oximeter showed his oxygen levels were normal.
She applied a chest seal to treat the puncture wound.
The doctor recommended using a contraceptive device for birth control.
Medical equipment in the emergency room saves lives daily.
The hospital ordered new diagnostic devices for the ICU.
negative_examples: The engineer calibrated the ultrasonic testing equipment.
She used a kitchen thermometer to check the soup temperature.
The mechanic's diagnostic tool identified the engine problem.
He wore safety goggles while operating the power drill.
The scientist used laboratory instruments to analyze samples.
The fitness tracker monitored her daily steps and heart rate.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Industrial, Scientific, Safety, Diagnostic
